hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Hylian Shield#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a grotto full of #spider webs#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Shield# and #an Ice Trap#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #the Fire Arrows#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Map of the Fire Temple#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Map of the Spirit Temple# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Heart Container# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Barinade#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #an Ocarina# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Hylian Shield#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say Ganondorf knows where to find the instrument of his doom.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.
